channel.title: CVE Feed for Microsoft Corporation -- Lync for Mac
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Microsoft Corporation -- Lync for Mac

item.title: CVE-2017-0129|2024-08-05T12:55:18.652Z -- microsoft%20corporation -- lync%20for%20mac
item.description: Microsoft Lync for Mac 2011 fails to properly validate certificates, allowing remote attackers to alter server-client communications, aka "Microsoft Lync for Mac Certificate Validation Vulnerability."
